group_1.textLeft: So this is Sakae Ward, the center of @kawaii-ness in the city!
Oh my gosh, this is the best!

group_1.textRight: There! That's the place!
This shop has all kinds of unique, cute@accessories for sale.
It's the one those girls who came to my shop@were talking about!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa! Even the outside is adorable!
C'mon, let's take a look inside!

group_1.textRight: Okay!
Whoa... This place is amazing.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, no kidding! It's overflowing with@everything cute!
Oh!

group_1.textCenter: I LOVE the character on this hairclip!

group_1.textRight: Huh?!
You think that's cute? It's covered in@bandages... It's kinda creepy...

group_1.textLeft: That's what makes it so great! It's@gurokawa!

group_1.textRight: Guro...what?

group_1.narration: "Gurokawa! Grotesque AND kawaii! Cool as@it is, the goth subculture in America is more@grotesque than Japanese goth-loli; gurokawa@is different! You sprinkle a bit of grotesque@in your kawaii, not the other way around."

group_1.textLeft: Whoops, my bad.
I can't keep my mouth shut when I talk about@stuff I'm really into...
What do ya think about this skirt, Riko?

group_1.textRight: Ah! It's really cute!
The pastel colors are so soft and fuzzy!@It's really lovely.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* This skirt would be considered@dreamy-kawaii! I'm glad you like it!
But it's a real bummer...
There's no way I'm gonna fit all this awesome@stuff in my closet.

group_1.textRight: Is your house not very big?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I live by myself. It's just one room.
I think it's about a thousand square feet?
And my closet's already jam-packed full of@clothes.

group_1.textRight: Feet...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, right! Japan uses the metric system...
Hold up, I'll look up the conversion.
It's the size of about 60 tatami mats!

group_1.textRight: [chara:303501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
[chara:305201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Gyaru! Real life Japanese fashionistas in@the flesh! Kawaii!
Uh... Are you talking about us?

group_1.textRight: Whoa! A foreigner?!
[chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]My English isn't great... Umm... I'm... @Emily?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Hajimemashite, Emily-san!
Watashi wa Ashley! Ashley Taylor desu!

group_1.textRight: Wow! Her Japanese is really good!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa! She's fluent!

group_1.textRight: Well hello, and welcome to Japan!

group_1.textLeft: Uh... I think we should keep it down...
Oh, right! I just get so excited talking to@new people!
It's so great getting to use my Japanese @with people IN JAPAN!

group_1.textRight: Get outta here! You're, like, fluent!
Uh... What was your name again? Ashley?@Ashley... Aaassshhhley...
Ash!

group_1.textLeft: Ash?
Are you giving me a nickname?

group_1.textRight: Yup! Just cut Ashley short and you get Ash!
Cute, huh?!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it is! Super kawaii!

group_1.textRight: Have you been living in Japan long, Ash?

group_1.textLeft: Nah. I haven't even been here a full week@yet.

group_1.textRight: You JUST got here then! Are you a student? A@tourist?

group_1.textLeft: I'm studying abroad here so I can find ALL@of the kawaii!

group_1.textRight: Kawaii?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! I came here to track down as much@kawaii as I can possibly find!
Like the sort of stuff they sell here.
And, you know, anime-style kawaii stuff too.@I love it all!

group_1.textRight: Does that mean you're interested in maid@cafes, and things like that?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! I went to one yesterday! It was a@BLAST!

group_1.textRight: Oh, you really do know where to go, then. If@you've already been to a maid cafe, then...
Oh!
I heard there's a place they call a sacred@spot for some manga's fans around here...
Anyway, we'll see ya around!

group_1.textLeft: Let's hang out sometime, Ash!
Hmm...
Riko?

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: I'd love it if you called me Ash, too!

group_1.textRight: Okay! I'll call you that, then...Ash!

group_1.textLeft: Yayyy! That's me! I'm Ash!
Okay, let's go find that sacred spot!
